headline.main: In Past Land Cases, Gorsuch Has Limited Environmentalists
headline.print_headline: In Past Land Cases, Gorsuch Has Limited Environmentalists

lead_paragraph: Supreme Court nominee Neil Gorsuch has shown a willingness to limit the participation of environmental groups in lawsuits involving public lands, writing in one case that allowing conservationists to intervene could complicate and slow down the judicial process, according to an Associated Press review of his rulings as a federal appeals court judge.
